user_query: I need some inspiration for my upcoming Diablo 4 gameplay. Can you provide me with the latest gameplays available? Additionally, I'm curious about the WN8, WN7, battles, victories, and defeats for my World of Tanks account with the name 'PasiHD'.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest gameplay videos or streams for Diablo 4 to gather inspiration.
Retrieve battle statistics including WN8, WN7, total battles, victories, and defeats for the World of Tanks account 'PasiHD'.
